data.actual_result: The button does nothing and the notification stays
data.expected_result: The notification should go away and be marked as read
data.short_description: Mark as Read in the notification does nothing
data.steps_to_repro: - Receive PM - Go to notification dropdown - Press "Reply" and reply - Press "Mark as Read" - Note: I know I sent a similar report, I forgot a step that's  important -
